actor.player.State

  • Packages that use State 
    Package Description
    actor.player  

    • Uses of State in actor.player

      Classes in actor.player that implement State 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DeathController.CarDeath
      Implements the frames needed for the car death animation.
      class  DeathController.WaterDeath
      Implements the frames needed for the water death animation.
      class  WalkingController.BackwardsWalk
      Implements the logic for a frog walking Backwards
      class  WalkingController.ForwardsWalk
      Implements the logic for a frog walking forwards
      class  WalkingController.LeftWalk
      Implements the logic for a frog walking left
      class  WalkingController.RightWalk
      Implements the logic for a frog walking Right
